definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: And Chinese steel mills have been forced to make purchases on the spot market.
sentences.chinese: 中国的钢铁厂被迫在现货市场购货。

sentences.english: Selection of flowmeter which is generally used in iron and steel works is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍几种钢铁厂中常用的流量仪表的选用。

sentences.english: Surya Narayan Bandaru Has Pakistan Iron oar and Coke reserves for establishment of a Steel Plant ?
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯塔有储备铁桨和焦炭来建造钢铁厂吗？

sentences.english: My grandfather Herman worked in the Wheeling Steel plant.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父赫尔曼在一个钢铁厂工作。

sentences.english: Leasing Gujiao steel plants, the placement of laid-off employees 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 租赁古交钢铁厂，安置下岗职工500多人。

sentences.english: It is possible to premix the ore at the shipping point thus saving time at the iron works.
sentences.chinese: 矿石在装运地点预先混合可给钢铁厂节省很多时间。

sentences.english: Why this fire incidents repeatedly happening in this steel factory ?…. Officials should seriously look into the matter….
sentences.chinese: 为什么这家钢铁厂三番五次发生火灾事故？

sentences.english: Therefore, the utility model is suitable for trolleys of sintering machines or burning machine in steel plant.
sentences.chinese: 适用各钢铁厂烧结机或焙烧机台车上。

sentences.english: Eight trucks worth of scrap were sold to local steel mills.
sentences.chinese: 八卡车之多的废金属被卖给当地钢铁厂。

sentences.english: Many steelworks have to be closed down, causing major unemployment in an area.
sentences.chinese: 许多钢铁厂倒闭，导致该地区的大批人失业。

sentences.english: The blanks for the plant are supplied by Pavlodar steel works.
sentences.chinese: 这些坯料由巴布洛达尔钢铁厂供应。

sentences.english: Dirty old steel factories are being upgraded or relocated.
sentences.chinese: 肮脏陈旧的钢铁厂正在进行设备升级或迁移。

sentences.english: The blanks for the plant are supplied by the neighbor – Pavlodar steel works.
sentences.chinese: 这个厂所用的坯料由临近的巴普洛达尔钢铁厂提供。

sentences.english: At Shijingshan we passed the huge steel mill and the power plant.
sentences.chinese: 我们经过石景山这座大钢铁厂和发电厂。

sentences.english: The control system has been put into use in Laiwu Iron and Steel Company.
sentences.chinese: 相应控制软件在莱芜钢铁厂已得到较好的应用。

sentences.english: Starting bare-handed , you have built up so many steel plants. This is nothing short of miraculous.
sentences.chinese: 你们白手起家，修建了许多钢铁厂，这简直是个奇迹。

definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
